channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Doppelganger - Browser automation for everyone
item.description:
Doppelganger - Browser automation for everyone

Local-first browser automation platform with visual task builder, API access, and privacy-centric design.
I think this is a good Power Automate alternative.
item.content:encoded:
Doppelganger - Browser automation for everyone

Local-first browser automation platform with visual task builder, API access, and privacy-centric design.
I think this is a good Power Automate alternative.

item.title: Sublogue
item.description:
Sublogue

Sublogue injects IMDb/RT ratings, plot, cast, and runtimes into your SRTs — and scrubs out the rubbish while it’s there. Zero timing drift.
item.content:encoded:
Sublogue

Sublogue injects IMDb/RT ratings, plot, cast, and runtimes into your SRTs — and scrubs out the rubbish while it’s there. Zero timing drift.

item.title: Markstack
item.description:
Markstack

Fast, minimal static site generator that transforms markdown into searchable documentation sites. Built to run anywhere, even on a Raspberry Pi.
Another Hugo alternative.
item.content:encoded:
Markstack

Fast, minimal static site generator that transforms markdown into searchable documentation sites. Built to run anywhere, even on a Raspberry Pi.
Another Hugo alternative.

item.title: Docker Cloudflare Tunnel Sync
item.description:
Docker Cloudflare Tunnel Sync

Automatically synchronize Cloudflare Tunnels and routes from Docker container labels.
item.content:encoded:
Docker Cloudflare Tunnel Sync

Automatically synchronize Cloudflare Tunnels and routes from Docker container labels.

item.title: Crooner
item.description:
Crooner

A lightweight Docker-native cron scheduler written in Rust. Execute commands in other containers on schedule.
item.content:encoded:
Crooner

A lightweight Docker-native cron scheduler written in Rust. Execute commands in other containers on schedule.

item.title: Logic Paper
item.description:
Logic Paper

Batch document generation engine. Transforms raw Excel data into high-fidelity PDF, Word, and PowerPoint reports using Jinja2 templates and Headless LibreOffice. Features robust logic strategies, privacy masking, and real-time telemetry.
Now, this is what I’m talking about. I’m looking for a way to automate generating PDF documents from records from my Airtable or Grist or anywhere data. This is interesting.
item.content:encoded:
Logic Paper

Batch document generation engine. Transforms raw Excel data into high-fidelity PDF, Word, and PowerPoint reports using Jinja2 templates and Headless LibreOffice. Features robust logic strategies, privacy masking, and real-time telemetry.
Now, this is what I’m talking about. I’m looking for a way to automate generating PDF documents from records from my Airtable or Grist or anywhere data. This is interesting.

item.title: Job Ops
item.description:
Job Ops

DevOps thinking applied to job hunting.

AI-powered job discovery and tailored resume/CV generation.

Looking at the README though I think it’s tailored for IT jobs only? Wish it could do Finance job opportunities as well.
item.content:encoded:
Job Ops

DevOps thinking applied to job hunting.

AI-powered job discovery and tailored resume/CV generation.

Looking at the README though I think it’s tailored for IT jobs only? Wish it could do Finance job opportunities as well.

item.title: Bmus - Back Me Up Scotty
item.description:
Bmus - Back Me Up Scotty

BmuS is a powerful free bash based enterprise level backup program for the automated backup of files, directories, and MySQL databases from a Linux system to a NAS or NAS to NAS. With the Docker version you can also backup Win and Mac system. It features encryption, cloud backup, deduplication, multi language support and much more.
item.content:encoded:
Bmus - Back Me Up Scotty

BmuS is a powerful free bash based enterprise level backup program for the automated backup of files, directories, and MySQL databases from a Linux system to a NAS or NAS to NAS. With the Docker version you can also backup Win and Mac system. It features encryption, cloud backup, deduplication, multi language support and much more.
